title: Delaware DSA Bylaws
fallbackContent:
The Delaware DSA chapter bylaws outline our governance structure, decision-making processes, and operational procedures. These bylaws were democratically approved by our membership and can only be amended through a vote of the general membership.

Our bylaws reflect our commitment to democratic governance, transparency, and member-led organizing. They establish the roles and responsibilities of elected officers, committees, and the general membership.

keyGovernanceSections.title: Chapter Structure
keyGovernanceSections.description: Our chapter is structured with a Steering Committee, elected officers, standing committees, and working groups. General membership meetings are held monthly.

keyGovernanceSections.title: Decision Making
keyGovernanceSections.description: Major decisions are made democratically through membership votes. Our chapter strives for consensus while recognizing the need for timely action.

keyGovernanceSections.title: Elections & Terms
keyGovernanceSections.description: Officers serve for two-year terms. Elections are held annually with staggered terms to ensure continuity of leadership and institutional knowledge.

keyGovernanceSections.title: Amendments
keyGovernanceSections.description: Bylaws can be amended through a two-thirds vote of members present at a general meeting, with amendments proposed at least two weeks in advance.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How are bylaws amended?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Bylaws can be amended through a two-thirds vote of members present at a general meeting. Proposed amendments must be submitted to the membership at least two weeks before the vote.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: Who can propose amendments?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Any DSA member in good standing can propose amendments to the bylaws. Proposals can be submitted to the Steering Committee, which will place them on the agenda for a general meeting.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: When were the bylaws last updated?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Our bylaws were last updated on {lastUpdated}. The changes included [description of recent changes or "clarifications to committee structure and updates to the electoral process"].

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How do the bylaws relate to DSA national?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Our chapter bylaws complement the national DSA constitution and bylaws. In any case where our local bylaws conflict with national governing documents, the national documents take precedence.
